title: Ticket #114: Clean up download graph tool (tools/graphs/downloads/extract-data)
description:
The download graph tool (tools/graphs/downloads/extract-data in CVS) is a bit of a hard coded mess. It should be cleaned up.

  • Make writing the CSV and graphs/data/gnuplot files optional – Allow command line to specify where to write the CSV and graphs. Post new commen
